CustomField.description: This field is required in order to use the CSi DocPrep integration. It is used to store the mapping code relating Ownership Types in nCino to CSi.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is required in order to use the CSi DocPrep integration. It is used to store the mapping code relating Ownership Types in nCino to CSi.
CustomField.label: CSi Mapping Code
